name: time
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pubnub_network.
Tool description: The PubNub Network makes Real-time Communications Simple  with an easy API. Two Functions: Send/Receive (Publish/Subscribe). We provide a web-scale API for businesses to build scalable Data Push communication apps on Mobile, Tablet and Web. Bidirectional JSON. Ask for commit access - via Twitter: @pubnub - via IRC: #pubnub on FreeNode
API description: Retrieves the current time token from the PubNub Network.
